attributes.action: urge the Olympic Committee to change the logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people feel the new Olympic logo is an embarrassment and portrays the country in the worst possible way.

The logo should be replaced immediately, it is generally agreed that the original logo was fine in the first place.

Potential Sponsors and Advertisers can only be put off by the idea of associating their brand with this logo.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
